headline: London Bridge Republican Women meet Monday, April 4
author: tsn-thestandard
sentences: Featured guest speakers are Christina Spurlock, candidate for Clerk of Mohave Superior Court; Bill Hardt, candidate for State Representative; Abraham Hamadeh, candidate for Arizona Attorney General; and Mark Finchem, candidate for Arizona Secretary of State.
LAKE HAVASU CITY – The London Bridge Republican Women will have their April meeting and dinner on Monday, April 4 at Shugrues Restaurant and Brewery’s Bridgeview Room located at 1425 McCulloch Blvd.
Reservations can be made to Amie Boggs by calling (928) 231-6805 by Friday, April 1 at 12 p.m. No reservations will be given at the door.
N. Check-in begins at 5 p.m. and dinner begins at 6 p.m.
Both cash and check will be acceptable at the door.
